title: Daomu Biji: The Southern Archives - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Historical   Horror   Supernatural
tags: Clever Protagonist   Schemes And Conspiracies   Secrets
author: Nan Pai San Shu   Xu Lei   南派三叔
description: From 1877 to 1878, droughts occurred in nine Chinese provinces, accompanied by thirty-two other disasters. Those affected accounted for half of the country’s population. During this year, China quickly became a cannibalistic hell. This period became known as Ding Wuqihuang. Ding Wuqihuang started with a drought and ended with a plague that spread from China to all of Southeast Asia, lasting for nearly half a century. Our story takes place in this period. The plague in the southern jungle, the truth about Ding Wuqihuang, a father and daughter… >
